seniority_level.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and responsibilities include architecture and team collaboration, indicating senior-level expectations

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on building/maintaining data pipelines, infrastructure, and working with analytics teams

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary tools mentioned are Airflow (orchestration), dbt (transformation), and AWS Redshift/S3 (storage), which are typically used for batch ETL pipelines in e-commerce contexts

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include driving data infrastructure and architecture forward, working with stakeholders, and ensuring data quality — indicating technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly states 'We work with the AWS technology stack - Redshift, S3, EC2, Lambda, SageMaker' and lists AWS as a must-have skill

secondary_clouds.evidence: GCP is mentioned as a 'nice to have' skill, indicating it may be used in some capacity or considered for future use

processing_paradigm.evidence: While no explicit streaming tools are mentioned, e-commerce data pipelines often require both batch (daily reports) and real-time (order tracking) processing; Airflow can handle both, and SageMaker implies ML pipelines that may be batch or streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow is explicitly listed as a required tool and is a core part of the tech stack

storage_layer.evidence: AWS Redshift (data warehouse) and S3 (data lake) are both mentioned, indicating a mixed storage architecture typical of modern data platforms

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Stockholm, Sweden, and no remote work is mentioned — implying the role is based in that region, though 'not exclusively based in Sweden' suggests some flexibility within the Nordics

timezone_focus.evidence: Headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden, and team primarily based in Sweden — strongly implies European timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Location is specified as Stockholm, and no remote work is mentioned — implies relocation to Stockholm may be required, though 'not exclusively based in Sweden' suggests possible regional flexibility

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship; location is in Sweden, not the US, so H1B is not applicable

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas or OPT/CPT; location in Sweden makes US student visas irrelevant

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned; company is in Sweden, so EU work authorization is likely required, but no specific citizenship is stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is 'full_time' and 'permanent', with comprehensive benefits listed — typical of W2 employment in Sweden

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits include premium pension, private healthcare, 30 days vacation, parental pay lift, wellness allowance, and social events — indicating a comprehensive package

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'Learn, grow, be challenged' and 'drive the data infrastructure and its architecture forward' — implies growth opportunities but no specific career tracks are defined

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working closely with Analytics team and stakeholders, and being part of a tech team — suggests collaboration with senior colleagues, but no formal mentorship program is stated

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions, advancement, or career ladder in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: Responsibilities include driving architecture and infrastructure, suggesting an IC track (e.g., to Staff/Principal), but no management or specialist tracks are mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have skills (SQL, Python, AWS, Terraform, dbt, Airflow) and nice-to-have (GCP, ecommerce), with some flexibility noted ('experience of any other cloud platform... also considered advantageous')

scope_definition.evidence: Role is clearly defined as a Senior Data Engineer focused on building/maintaining data pipelines, infrastructure, and working with analytics — no hybrid or multi-role expectations

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (SQL, Python, AWS, Airflow, dbt, Terraform) are reasonable for a senior data engineer role; no unrealistic combinations or excessive years of experience demanded
